cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:

This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)e250950d21be1801232d8b85d53f40f4c7268e3ddcba07dfb9e563e8a4973a2d%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)4671139fcc6a2d205b9e36c14d8ca8123b11c044dce37e2214f1ad18d2fbeeeb%}.
